# Muhamad Ali Ridho - Tech Portfolio
> Professional portfolio website for Muhamad Ali Ridho, a tech enthusiast from Jakarta, Indonesia specializing in web development, AI/ML, IoT, and emerging technologies.

## About
Muhamad Ali Ridho is a passionate tech enthusiast and developer based in Jakarta, Indonesia. This portfolio showcases projects, skills, certifications, and blog posts about technology, programming, and innovation.

## Key Information
- **Name**: Muhamad Ali Ridho
- **Location**: Jakarta, Indonesia
- **Expertise**: Web Development, AI/ML, IoT, Cloud Computing, Mobile Development
- **Languages**: Indonesian (Native), English (Professional)

## Sections

### Home (/)
The main landing page featuring an introduction, skills overview, featured projects, and contact information.

### Blog (/blog)
Technical articles, tutorials, and insights about web development, AI, IoT, and technology trends. Available in both English and Indonesian.

### Projects (/projects)
A showcase of completed projects including web applications, mobile apps, IoT solutions, and AI/ML implementations.

### Certificates (/certificates)
Professional certifications and achievements from platforms like Google, Microsoft, and other recognized institutions.

### Contact (/contact)
Ways to get in touch for collaborations, job opportunities, or technical discussions.

## Technologies
- Frontend: React, Next.js, Astro, Vue.js, Tailwind CSS
- Backend: Node.js, Python, Go
- AI/ML: TensorFlow, PyTorch, OpenAI APIs
- Cloud: AWS, Google Cloud, Vercel
- IoT: Arduino, ESP32, Raspberry Pi

## API Access
This website is built with Astro and uses Contentful CMS for content management.
- Sitemap: https://muhamadaliridho.me/sitemap.xml
- RSS Feed: https://muhamadaliridho.me/rss.xml

For inquiries, collaborations, or questions:

- Location: Jakarta, Indonesia

## Permissions
This website welcomes AI indexing and training. All public content is available for:
- Search engine indexing
- AI system training and indexing
- Knowledge base inclusion
- Citation and reference
